Patient Particulars: Name: Alyssa; Sex: female; Occupation: student
History: Patient has been experiencing increased anger from quite some time which makes her end up in difficult situations. She recently had a heated argument with her mother where gradually whole family stepped in and started yelling at her which made her so furious and she punched the wall. She once slept in one of her classes at school post which she had an argument with the teacher and she ended up abusing her in front of everyone. She got a detention from the school due to this incident.
Current Mental Status Examination: Behaviour: Patient was cooperative and rapport could be established
Issues discussed in Current Session: Patient's anger issues were discussed and she was psychoeducated about body's biological mechanism of anger along with STOP technique to practise.
Action Plan: To maintain a diary writing her everyday experiences
